params.name: vocab_size
params.description: Vocabulary size of the LayoutLMv2 model. Defines the number of different tokens that can be represented bythe inputs_ids passed when calling LayoutLMv2Model or TFLayoutLMv2Model.

params.name: hidden_size
params.description: Dimension of the encoder layers and the pooler layer.

params.name: num_hidden_layers
params.description: Number of hidden layers in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: num_attention_heads
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: intermediate_size
params.description: Dimension of the intermediate (i.e., feed-forward) layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: hidden_act
params.description: The non-linear activation function (function or string) in the encoder and pooler. If string, gelu,relu, selu and gelu_new are supported.

params.name: hidden_dropout_prob
params.description: The dropout probability for all fully connected layers in the embeddings, encoder, and pooler.

params.name: attention_probs_dropout_prob
params.description: The dropout ratio for the attention probabilities.

params.name: max_position_embeddings
params.description: The maximum sequence length that this model might ever be used with. Typically set this to something largejust in case (e.g., 512 or 1024 or 2048).

params.name: type_vocab_size
params.description: The vocabulary size of the token_type_ids passed when calling LayoutLMv2Model orTFLayoutLMv2Model.

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.

params.name: layer_norm_eps
params.description: The epsilon used by the layer normalization layers.

params.name: max_2d_position_embeddings
params.description: The maximum value that the 2D position embedding might ever be used with. Typically set this to somethinglarge just in case (e.g., 1024).

params.name: max_rel_pos
params.description: The maximum number of relative positions to be used in the self-attention mechanism.

params.name: rel_pos_bins
params.description: The number of relative position bins to be used in the self-attention mechanism.

params.name: fast_qkv
params.description: Whether or not to use a single matrix for the queries, keys, values in the self-attention layers.

params.name: max_rel_2d_pos
params.description: The maximum number of relative 2D positions in the self-attention mechanism.

params.name: rel_2d_pos_bins
params.description: The number of 2D relative position bins in the self-attention mechanism.

params.name: image_feature_pool_shape
params.description: The shape of the average-pooled feature map.

params.name: coordinate_size
params.description: Dimension of the coordinate embeddings.

params.name: shape_size
params.description: Dimension of the width and height embeddings.

params.name: has_relative_attention_bias
params.description: Whether or not to use a relative attention bias in the self-attention mechanism.

params.name: has_spatial_attention_bias
params.description: Whether or not to use a spatial attention bias in the self-attention mechanism.

params.name: has_visual_segment_embedding
params.description: Whether or not to add visual segment embeddings.

params.name: detectron2_config_args
params.description: Dictionary containing the configuration arguments of the Detectron2 visual backbone. Refer to thisfilefor details regarding default values.
